title: Visual Studio Team Services Deployments
name: auth0-visualstudio-deploy
author: auth0
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the possibility to deploy Rules and Custom Database Connections from TFS.
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will stop any Rules and Database Connection scripts from being deployed from TFS to Auth0.

auth0.scopes: read:connections update:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules delete:clients

TFS_PROJECT.description: The project from which you want to deploy rules and database scripts

TFS_BRANCH.description: The branch we should monitor for commits

TFS_PATH.description: The path we should monitor for commits

TFS_TOKEN.description: Your personal access token for GitLab

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Webhook URL for Slack used to notify you of successful and failed deployments
